CodeList.Name: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Have a Lack of Energy
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I have a lack of energy.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Have a Lack of Energy

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I have nausea.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Have Nausea

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: Because of my physical condition, I have trouble meeting the needs of my family.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Trouble Meeting Needs of Family

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I have pain.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Have Pain

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I am bothered by side effects of treatment.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Bothered by Treatment Side Effect

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I feel ill.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Feel Ill

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Am Forced to Spend Time in Bed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I am forced to spend time in bed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Am Forced to Spend Time in Bed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Feel Close to My Friends
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I feel close to my friends.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Feel Close to My Friends

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I get emotional support from my family.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Get Emotional Support From Family

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Get Support From My Friends
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I get support from my friends.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Get Support From My Friends

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-My Family Has Accepted My Illness
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: My family has accepted my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - My Family Has Accepted My Illness

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I am satisfied with family communication about my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Satisfied Family Communication of Illness

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Feel Close to My Partner
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I feel close to my partner (or the person who is my main support).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Feel Close to My Partner

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Am Satisfied With My Sex Life
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I am satisfied with my sex life.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Am Satisfied With My Sex Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I feel sad.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Feel Sad

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-Satisfied With How I Am Coping
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I am satisfied with how I am coping with my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Satisfied With How I Am Coping

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I am losing hope in the fight against my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Losing Hope Against Illness

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I feel nervous.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Feel Nervous

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I worry about dying.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Worry About Dying

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-Worry My Condition Will Get Worse
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Emotional Well-Being: I worry that my condition will get worse.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Worry My Condition Will Get Worse

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am able to work (include work at home).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Am Able to Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: My work (include work at home) is fulfilling.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - My Work Is Fulfilling

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Am Able to Enjoy Life
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am able to enjoy life.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Am Able to Enjoy Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I have accepted my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Have Accepted My Illness

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am sleeping well.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Am Sleeping Well

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-Enjoy Things I Usually Do for Fun
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am enjoying the things I usually do for fun.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Enjoy Things I Usually Do for Fun

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-Content With Quality of My Life
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am content with the quality of my life right now.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Content With Quality of My Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Have Been Short of Breath
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I have been short of breath.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Have Been Short of Breath

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am self-conscious about the way I dress.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Self-conscious About Way I Dress

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Additional Concerns: One or both of my arms are swollen or tender.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - One or Both Arms Are Swollen or Tender

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I feel sexually attractive.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Feel Sexually Attractive

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Am Bothered by Hair Loss
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am bothered by hair loss.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Am Bothered by Hair Loss

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I worry that other members of my family might someday get the same illness I have.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Worry Family Will Get Illness

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-Worry About the Effect of Stress
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I worry about the effect of stress on my illness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Worry About the Effect of Stress

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Am Bothered by Change in Weight
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am bothered by a change in weight.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Am Bothered by Change in Weight

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-I Am Able to Feel Like a Woman
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am able to feel like a woman.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - I Am Able to Feel Like a Woman

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC005-Certain Parts of Body Have Pain
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I have certain parts of my body where I experience pain.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACT-B Version 4 - Certain Parts of Body Have Pain

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire FACT-B Version 4 Test Code Terminology
